title: Vegetarian spanish rice
ingredients: ['1 medium onion, finely chopped', '1 large green pepper, deseeded and finely chopped', '1 celery stick, finely chopped', '2 garlic cloves, finely chopped', '115g (4oz) button mushrooms, sliced', '175g (6oz) long-grain white rice', '350ml (12fl oz) low-sodium tomato juice', '225ml (8fl oz) low-sodium vegetable stock', 'pepper to taste', '1 bay leaf', '6 plum tomatoes, halved, deseeded and diced']
